column5: it was real windy but I went for a run and drove over a big school of fish and wondered, hmmmm. what could they be  stopped the boat dropped the anchor and the camera....ahhhh perch and lots of them I am getting better at recording them, I think you will like this one a few minutes from the 3 hours of recordings      how the heck am I going to find the time to fish with all this fun happening around me  hope you liked it
Nice, how deep were they?
these ones were 15 ft but an hour later I stopped over 35 ft of water cause I saw fish on the finder and thought they might be crappie but put the camera down and another big school of perch
Thats so awesome!
Awesome Terry    Love the tune also Keep up the good work!!! Leechman
like i said, id never get any fishing done
very kewl... i had no idea the perch could get that big....  great tune too
hmmm... 1:38, top right corner...
it's hard to tell how big things are  without something to compare it to.  but the anchor was  25 or more feet away from the camera, so I had a pretty good field of vision
Oh, and great video, I love stuff like this... keep 'em comin'!
Seen that too.Look like a a fat smallie.

Pretty cool Terry. How is the visibility in the kawartha lakes? Have you tried it? I know there are times when I have a good school of eyes right under my boat........it would be cool to see what the heck they're doing down there!!!  S.
I am not sure how far you could see on  the kawarthas, because most of it isn't too deep I would think you would have some visibility, when I get a change I will try over there with the camera
"how the heck am I going to find the time to fish with all this fun happening around me"    More Hemingway less Jacques Cousteau
That's pretty neat Terry.  The camera is pretty clear, especially when it shows the anchor chain.  Cool  Joey
What is the name of that song and the artist??  Its awesome!
That's awesome.  You gotta love movies of stripeys. I certainly wouldn't do much fishing if I had one of those cameras.  Looks like real fun. Thanks for sharing. 007
I have no idea who sings it but it seemed to fit the video
what kind of camera are you using?
the fish were definetly getting into it at the beginning
it's a Marcum  VS825C
Nice to have such clear water to film in. Perch are my wife's favourite fish! Thanks for putting that together Terry.
yummmy PERCH  thanks for the vid Terry
